page.title: 10RECREATION IN WHALEY BRIDGE
page.content: There are two reservoirs in our area these are Toddbrook and Combs which both supply water for the canal these also provide extra facilities such as fishing,windsurfing and sailing.Both reservoirs have clubs for sailing and windsurfing which own optimists for beginners,toppers for advanced beginners,mirrors for two people and GP's(general purpose)for two or more people.I have been to one of these clubs for a course on sailing. This is what I thought about it The first week after I'd struggled to put my life jacket on when I got on the water I pulled the rope in to go fast. One side of the boat lifted out of the water. I was terrified. I wondered what would happen if I capsized.I was so busy thinking about capsizing I nearly hit the buoy. Then I eventually got back I wished I could
